entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
